specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Fancy Yarn Fancy yarns are specialty yarns, such as feather yarn, eyelash yarn, and novelty yarn, that add unique textures and visual effects to fabrics, making them stand out.
specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn - Appearance > Ruffled
specifications.Care Advice: Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not iron Recommended Use Bridal, Blouses, Partywear, Dresses
